patthana8.19:1.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati
patthana8.19:1.1_1: hetupaccayā. Āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo
patthana8.19:1.1_2: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto
patthana8.19:1.1_3: nasāsavo ca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.19:2.1: Āsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.19:3.1: Āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavañca āsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.19:4.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
